details:
Providing support for the entire development team.  
	
	
Setting code guidelines and enforcing best practices.  


Research of new technologies and solutions.  


##### Development of commercial system for internal use: #####

- Programming Scheduler with Air Video Servers integrations

- Playlist generations

- Management of Commercial Orders, Agreements and Contracts

- Management of Customers and SAP integration


##### Development of internal Security and Authorization Systems #####

- LDAP Integration

- SSO features for internal systems

- Users, Roles and Funcionality Management

- Multi LDAP support

- Web Api implementation and RabbitMQ integration for replication


##### Development of Customer portal featuring #####

- Customer's user management integrated with internal LDAP server

- Role and Groups management

- Commercial order integration with  internal systems.

- Implementation of Services Worker for client cache and fast navigation

- RabbitMQ integration


##### Development of Air Video Server Integration #####

- Exporting the commercial programming schedule into Air Video servers (SQUID)


##### Development of Internal Access Control for Employees #####

- Management of visitor's access permision for buildings.

- Inventory management for company equipment

- Tracking of Employees Sign ins and Outs.

##### Development of a custom CMS #####
	
- Develop and implementation of Workflows for publishing and deployments of content.

- Handling of MSMQ queues for high availability and effective error handling.

- Development of web application for backend and frontend using CSS, JQuery, ASP.Net  and AjaxToolkit

- Research, configuration and implementacion of Apache Solr (a Lucene implementation) as content repository for frontend and as Search Engine
- Participation in the development of an SSO (Single Sign On) unifing the endpoints for systems of external users.

Development and maintenance of administration site.   


Development and maintenance of customer sales platform with high concurrency and volume.   


Development and implementation of communication protocols between cell phone carriers and telcoms.   


Development and Maintenance of werbservices for communication between internal platforms.   


Maintenance, architecture and database optimization.

Development of Data Transformation Software which generated SSIS packages for Intermex.

	- Generation of SSIS packages on runtime

	- Definition of dataflows and transformation between multiple systems

BPM Development using Fuego 3.5 (Nowadays is Oracle Aqualogic BPM) for Telefonica Argentina.


Integration with documentation systems of Telefonica.


Development in JSP and Java


Customization and Implementation of BugTracker.Net for Company Use

company: Ministerio de Trabajo, Empleo y Seguridad Social
details:
Development of support system for the PNRT (Plan Nacional de Regularizacion del Trabajo).

- Development and maintenance of workflows

- Sql Server optimization and problem solver (Deadlocks, bottlenecks and slow queries)
Development of Windows Application Survey Software for applicants to the "Plan Trabajar".
